attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I belive the United Kingdom should join the Schengen Agreement. 

- This agreement sould help fighting of cross border crime. 
-It would also aid the development of cross border transport
--Faster transfer times though airports with
--Aid train travel with the rest of europe to help make travelling the green way to europe easier.

I understand the problem of security but not signing this agreement is not helping our development as part of Europe
